# Domain

**Object**

A DNS domain name associated with an Apple School Manager organization.

## Declaration

```swift
object Domain
```

## Discussion

An organization can generate Managed Apple Accounts in Apple School Manager for the verified domains named in its `Domains` objects. For more information about verifying domains, see [https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT212275].

## Information about the organization

- **Read the organization**: Returns information about the Apple School Manager organization.
- **Organization**: Information about an Apple School Manager organization.
